modShortDescription: Adds a camera item modifier for helmets. Its pointed backwards now. But you can rotate and aim the camera in xml as you would like.
modDescription:
Adds a camera item modifier for helmets. Its pointed backwards now because Xythâ€™s daughter hates vultures sneaking up on her, but you can rotate and aim the camera in xml as you would like.
